<script>
    $(document).ready(function(){
        
        $("input#export").click(function(){
           // window.location.href = "#request.scheme#://#request.serverName#:#request.serverPort##request.contextPath#/web/userview/workflowPL/UV_PL_Geral/_/exportConfigLogs?d-1786728-e=2&6578706f7274=1";
            window.open('#request.scheme#://#request.serverName#:#request.serverPort##request.contextPath#/web/userview/workflowPL/UV_PL_Geral/_/exportConfigLogs?d-1786728-e=2&6578706f7274=1');
        });
        
        $("input#delete").click(function(){
           
            $.ajax({
                type:"GET",
                url: "/jw/api/list/list_campos_log",
                headers:{
                    "api_id": "#envVariable.apiIdAtualizarCampos#",
                    "api_key": "#envVariable.apiKeyAtualizarCampos#",
                    "Accept":"application/json",
                    "Content-Type": "application/json"
                },
                success: function(data){
                    if(data.total!=undefined && data.total > 0){
                        var count = 0;
                        while(count<=data.total-1){
                            var idCampo = data.data[count].id;
                            $.ajax({
                                type:"DELETE",
                                url: "/jw/api/form/camposLog/" + idCampo,
                                headers:{
                                    "api_id": "#envVariable.apiIdAtualizarCampos#",
                                    "api_key": "#envVariable.apiKeyAtualizarCampos#",
                                    "Accept":"application/json",
                                    "Content-Type": "application/json"
                                },
                                success: function(data){
                                    window.location = window.location.href.split("?")[0];
                                }
                            });
                            
                            count+=1;
                        }
                        
                    }
                }
            });
        
        });
        
    });
    
</script>
<input type="button" id="export" value="EXPORTAR LISTA" />
